sentences.en: Add cauliflower and cream of corn . Bring to a boil again.
sentences.cn: 再加入椰菜花及粟米蓉同煮至沸滚.

sentences.en: Also included in the green group of vegetables are broccoli, Brussels sprouts, and cabbage, which are, like cauliflower, cruciferous vegetables and contain powerful carcinogen blockers.
sentences.cn: 椰菜、抱子甘蓝和卷心菜也属于绿色组蔬菜，像菜花那样，都是十字花科蔬菜并且含有强有效的致癌物质阻断剂。

sentences.en: Broccoli and cauliflower are among the most nutritions nutritious vegetables.
sentences.cn: 花椰菜和菜花都是富含丰富营养的蔬菜.

sentences.en: Broccoli and cauliflower are among the most nutritious vegetables.
sentences.cn: 西兰花和花椰菜是最有营养价值的蔬菜.

sentences.en: Broccoli and cauliflower can grow outdoors from seed or as small plants.
sentences.cn: 西兰花和花椰菜可以在种子或者幼苗可以在户外种植.

sentences.en: Buy: broccoli, cauliflower, red kidney bean, lotus root, frozen strawberry.
sentences.cn: 采购: 西兰花, 花菜, 红腰果, 藕, 冷冻草莓.

sentences.en: Divide the cauliflower into florets and wash them thoroughly.
sentences.cn: 把菜花掰成一块块小花,然后仔细把它们洗干净.

sentences.en: I ordered a dish of unmixed stir - fried cauliflower in the restaurant.
sentences.cn: 我在餐馆点了一道清 炒菜 花.

sentences.en: I'm just making the sauce for the cauliflower.
sentences.cn: 我正在弄花椰菜的调味汁呢。

sentences.en: If cabbage, cauliflower, sunflower seed oil, colza is oily, wait.
sentences.cn: 如卷心菜 、 菜花 、 葵花子油 、 菜子油等.

sentences.en: If you don't have cucumbers, get creative–other vegetables such as cauliflower, carrots, or zucchini will make just as wonderful pickles!
sentences.cn: 如果你没有黄瓜，发挥创意吧——其它蔬菜像花椰菜、胡萝卜或南瓜也一样可以做出极好的泡菜！

sentences.en: Jars of mixed pickles contain gherkins and pieces of cauliflower as well as onions.
sentences.cn: 混合泡菜坛子里装有黄瓜、菜花片和洋葱.

sentences.en: Other great choices are veggies from the cruciferous family, which include cauliflower and Brussels sprouts. And, you can try new ways to use these vegetables.
sentences.cn: 另一种非常好的选择是花类蔬菜，包括花椰菜和布鲁塞尔豆芽，你也可用新方法制作这些蔬菜。

sentences.en: Spinach, egg - plant, cabbage, cauliflower, cucumber and turnip are our favorite vegetables.
sentences.cn: 菠菜, 茄子, 卷心菜, 花椰菜, 黄瓜,和萝卜都是我们喜欢吃的蔬菜.

sentences.en: They think broccoli is only green and cauliflower is only white.
sentences.cn: 他们认为西兰花只有绿色的,而菜花都是白色的.

sentences.en: This variant form of cauliflower is the ultimate fractal vegetable.
sentences.cn: 这种花椰菜的变种形式是一种极限分形蔬菜.

trans.tran_en: a vegetable with green leaves around a firm white centre
